results.title: Slow release nifedipine and atenolol as initial treatment in blacks with malignant hypertension.
results.text_hl: Slow release @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ as initial treatment in blacks with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Malignant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006974 @@@malignant hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Isles CG, Johnson AO, Milne FJ. Slow release nifedipine and atenolol as initial treatment in blacks with malignant hypertension. Br J Clin Pharmacol. 1986 Apr;21(4):377-83. PMID: 3518771
citations.BibTeX: @article{3518771, title={Slow release nifedipine and atenolol as initial treatment in blacks with malignant hypertension.}, author={Isles CG and Johnson AO and Milne FJ}, journal={Br J Clin Pharmacol}, volume={21}, number={4}, pages={377-83}}

results.title: Management of hypertensive crises.
results.text_hl: By contrast if the risk to the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ is measured in days rather than hours then oral therapy will be quite sufficient. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ retard can safely be given as initial treatment for uncomplicated @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Malignant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006974 @@@malignant hypertension@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ retard can be used for the milder cases of @DISEASE_Brain_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@encephalopathy@@@ or @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@.

citations.NLM: Isles CG. Management of hypertensive crises. Scott Med J. 1995 Feb;40(1):23-5. PMID: 7604239
citations.BibTeX: @article{7604239, title={Management of hypertensive crises.}, author={Isles CG}, journal={Scott Med J}, volume={40}, number={1}, pages={23-5}}
